评论概述: So comfy, sleek and a perfect fit!
类型: Fit Type: Flared 31" Inseam (Tall)Size: X-LargeColor: Black
评论详情: These flare leggings/pants are so wonderful! I'm 5'6" and the 31" inseam is perfect with my Skechers sneakers; nice & long without hitting the floor. Last year when I weighed 190lbs the 1X size fit like a charm; now I'm 165 and the X-Large is perfect.  The pocket is great for holding my phone in a pinch. Love these pants!

类型: Fit Type: Flared 28" Inseam (Regular)Size: LargeColor: Coral Pink
评论详情: I own at least 30 pairs of yoga pants. These are thinner than all of them, but I can live with that. The problem is the sizing is off. I have muscular thighs and a very small waist. Every pair of yoga pants I own is a large and they fit me fine. After trying a xl and a 1x, I completely gave up. The 1x fit my thighs but was way too big in the waist. I had to return them.  Also, the coral color is pretty, but the lavender pants (on the right in the photo) is NOT a true lavender. More like a weird pale purple grey.

类型: Fit Type: Flared 28" Inseam (Regular)Size: 1XColor: White
评论详情: Very slimming and comfortable. I’ve ordered 7 of them, that said one of the pairs stretched so much in the length I’ll have to pay a tailor to shorten them. Hoping they’re not all like that. Except for that I would’ve given 5 stars.

类型: Fit Type: Flared 28" Inseam (Regular)Size: X-LargeColor: Black
评论详情: Size is sooo small

类型: Fit Type: Flared 28" Inseam (Regular)Size: LargeColor: Sage
评论详情: I ordered 2 pair of Ofenti yoga pants, in 2 flared styles/ in 2 colors, & also ordered other similar clothing in other brands, & fabrics. These Ofenti yoga pants are rated my #1 winner for being easiest to manage wrinkles, easy care, comfortable wear & great appearance  Care: -wrinkle management: easiest care fabric of all the sports / lounge clothes I tried of various fabrics; so easy -I simply followed the tag instructions: for cold water wash & air dry: -relax the fabric: I allow time to soak with soap + fabric softener, so the fibers can relax as an important step to get rid of packaging wrinkles; rinse with fabric softener; lay flat to dry or hang to dry. (I stretch them a little by hand, or smooth by hand if needed, if any slight wrinkles are present) -this was the only garment that gave such simple care, & looked perfectly wrinkle free from the packaging wrinkles, due to the fabric blend. No wrinkle release spray was even needed, as I needed for the others  Appearance: -I find these yoga pants have such a nice appearance, & can even look like dressier pants, depending on how they worn. With the right shirt/ blouse plus heels, I will use them as ‘dressier’ pants. For me, they are a way to dress casual, comfortable, yet without wearing less dressy blue jeans. I like them better than most dress pants I’ve ever worn. I can see wearing them to art festivals/ museums, shopping, & even church with a longer blouse. With a tank or t-shirt, they serve as yoga pants/ exercise/ pickleball/ Zumba dance pants  Sizing: I ordered a L, at 5'4", c. 150lbs & they fit GREAT; not too tight or loose. Just right. I like the length, to wear with platform sandals/ shoes/ boots  -I love the versatility, ease of wash/ care, appearance, large pockets, style, soft comfortable fabric; just everything about them

类型: Fit Type: Flared 31" Inseam (Tall)Size: 1XColor: Shadow Grey
评论详情: I live in yoga pants during the winter. These are such a great quality pant. The material is soft, constricting without being too tight, and fit perfectly in the waist. I love that these have pockets! The color is nice too, it's a different kind of grey than your regular sweat pants. I definitely feel these are a great value for a great product. I do recommend looking at the size chart for the pants, as they run true to size. Overall, I love these!

评论详情: These leggings are on the thin side, I definitely feel a little exposed if I bend over or squat in them. However they are extremely soft and very comfortable, with generously sized pockets. 评论详情: They are really cute and flattering I just wish they were longer they are like an inch too short for me and I'm pretty short but they are still pretty cute

类型: Fit Type: Flared 28" Inseam (Regular)Size: SmallColor: Burgundy
评论详情: These leggings are comfy and fit well for me. Love the pockets and variety of color options. I like the $25 price point. I am 5'2" and 126 lbs, and I got my usual size small and they fit true to size. However, they are advertised as a 28" inseam which should be borderline too long for me (I usually do 26-27" inseams), but these are almost too short for me even at my 5'2" height, which never happens, so these must be closer to 25". So be aware the inseams are not accurately described, at least on the regular length; can't speak to the accuracy of the tall sizes they also offer. My only other complaint at this time is that they put the tag inside right on the seamline going down the middle of the butt, causing an unavoidable lump right there, so I'll have to the cut the tag out. Overall as long as you take into account the inseam length (removed a star for the inaccuracy), I think these are good value for the price. Will update this review if I have any issues with laundering or longer term wear.

类型: Fit Type: Flared 31" Inseam (Tall)Size: 1XColor: Brick
评论详情: I wanted to try a new style of leggings, since I have been wearing skinny style since the early 2000's. These are really comfortable! The color is a really pretty burnt orange color and the fabric is nice and thick. The pockets are actually functional too, which is a huge plus. My one issue is the stitching. I wore these once, and there is already a break in the double seam in the bottom. It was a distinct rip sound when I was doing squats and I thought I ripped a full hole. Thankfully these do have a double seam and the second thicker seam is holding well. These are definitely more for lounging and less for active working out.

类型: Fit Type: Flared 28" Inseam (Regular)Size: SmallColor: Coral Pink
评论详情: I thought I ordered the longer version of these, but apparently not. Unfortunately they're too short for me at 5'8". Still, they are shorter than the 28" inseam they claim, they're closer to 25", so just keep that in mind. I love the feel of the material though and the color is super pretty. They're not completely opaque, so I likely wouldn't have worn them to a yoga class, but they would have been fine around the house or with a longer top that covered my backside. I'm hoping a shorter friend of mine likes them because they're really comfortable!

类型: Fit Type: Flared 28" Inseam (Regular)Size: 3XColor: Shadow Grey
评论详情: Pretty comfy, fits well and plenty room for the booty, Soft and comforting. This grey color is more forgiving than I thought it would be. I do have a umbilical hernia that makes my stomach uneven so the pants do roll a little bit on my particular stomach but do not add undue pressure on the hernia so that’s a big plus for me!!

评论概述: I don't care for the slippery material.
类型: Fit Type: Flared 31" Inseam (Tall)Size: 1XColor: Steel Blue
评论详情: I now know that nylon with spandex is not for me. I like my yoga pants soft, and these pants are that slippery kind of fabric that I find very uncomfortable. I seem to sweat more, which could be good or bad. I ordered the longest length which fit my long legs very nicely. I am 5'8" so that pleased me. The color is nice, and the pants made it through the laundry fine. I would say that these pants just aren't for me.

类型: Fit Type: Flared 31" Inseam (Tall)Size: 1XColor: Sage
评论详情: I ordered the longer length and it came above my ankles. Comfortable otherwise. Great for someone shorter, not great for me.

类型: Fit Type: Flared 28" Inseam (Regular)Size: SmallColor: Lavender
评论详情: The color is exactly like the photos. However the legs are too short, I'm only 5/3 and they barely come down to my ankles. The legs are also more straight than flare - they are not flare at all like the photos. These might fit better for kids version. However the crotch is way too long. Weird fit overall.

评论概述: Too short & weird fit. And these are flares?
类型: Fit Type: Flared 28" Inseam (Regular)Size: X-SmallColor: Steel Blue
评论详情: These leggings are too short, even though I ordered my correct size. The waistband fits correctly, and it doesn't slide. But there's extra material in the crotch, so that I feel like I constantly need to pull these up.  FWIW, the hips, seat, and leg width all fit fine.  I do like the curved seaming on the back, as it's flattering. The pockets are deep enough for my phone.  The leg openings are nowhere near a "flare" style. They look like they are supposed to be regular leggings that got cut wrong. They don't have as much "slouch" as they look in the photos.

评论概述: So cute and soft, great for petite women
类型: Fit Type: Flared 28" Inseam (Regular)Size: SmallColor: Steel Blue
评论详情: My wife loves these leggings so much, she likes to wear them out and about, not just working out. The color is an earthy violet, very pretty, the single phone pocket on the right thigh is adequate, and the cut with the subtle flare is so chic. The fabric is buttery smooth and soft, and the leggings seem well made. My wife is 5’2”, 118 lbs and the size small fits perfectly. The length is perfect on her - wouldn’t be though for a much taller woman. My wife recommends washing inside out on delicate and hanging to dry.

评论概述: soft flare yoga pants with pockets
类型: Fit Type: Flared 28" Inseam (Regular)Size: SmallColor: Sage
评论详情: I order these high waist flare yoga leggings for working out. the leggings are made of a super soft and stretchy fabric that is opaque and not see through. they have a wide waistband for tummy control and a gusset crotch for movement. there are also pockets on the sides for holding phone or keys.  Pros:  fabric is very soft and comfortable for yoga or exercise high waist and flare cut is flattering on many body types side pockets are deep and can securely hold items Cons:  the fabric is thin and can show panty lines length is bit long for petite heights these yoga flare leggings are great for low impact workouts or athleisure. the material is buttery soft with lots of stretch. the high waist is supportive and the flare leg is trendy. the pockets are a convenient feature. just be aware the fabric is on the thinner side and the length is long. overall comfy and cute yoga pants.

类型: Fit Type: Flared 31" Inseam (Tall)Size: 1XColor: Shadow Grey
